localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

nodes.excerpt: Trexy allows you to track your own expenses. You can also track lending and borrowing records between your family and friends. Multi-currency comes in handy regardless of which currency you spend on. Expenses are grouped by category in monthly pie-chart.
nodes.title: Trexy - Track expenses and debts easily with multi-currency support.
nodes.author: Meng Taing

localize.description: Trexy允许你跟踪自己的支出。您还可以追踪家人和朋友之间的借贷记录。无论你用哪种货币消费，多币种都很方便。在每月的饼状图中，支出按类别进行分组。
localize.tagline: 支持多种货币，轻松追踪费用和债务。

localize.description: Trexy允許你跟蹤自己的支出。您還可以追蹤家人和朋友之間的借貸記錄。無論你用哪種貨幣消費，多幣種都很方便。在每月的餅狀圖中，支出按類別進行分組。
localize.tagline: 支持多種貨幣，輕鬆追蹤費用和債務。

nodes.excerpt: copypad.io - GPT3 enabled AI tool that writes eCommerce product copy for you.
nodes.title: copypad - GPT3 generated ecommerce product descriptions
nodes.author: Marijus Merkevicius

localize.description: copypad.io - 支持GPT3的人工智能工具，为你撰写电商产品文案。
localize.tagline: GPT3生成的电子商务产品描述

localize.description: copypad.io - 支持GPT3的人工智能工具，爲你撰寫電商產品文案。
localize.tagline: GPT3生成的電子商務產品描述

nodes.excerpt: Using AI to analyze property photos, Remodel It provides design inspiration, instant free remodeling estimates, and connects you to nearby contractors.
nodes.title: Remodel It - AI that reads property photos to create home reno estimates
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 利用人工智能分析房产照片，Remodel It提供设计灵感、即时免费改造估价，并将你与附近的承包商联系起来。
localize.tagline: 能读懂房产照片的人工智能，创造出房屋重新装修的估计。

localize.description: 利用人工智能分析房產照片，Remodel It提供設計靈感、即時免費改造估價，並將你與附近的承包商聯繫起來。
localize.tagline: 能讀懂房產照片的人工智能，創造出房屋重新裝修的估計。

nodes.excerpt: Share your websites, products, social pages, and more, all in one link with Bio Sites from Unfold. You have more than one link, your bio should too. Available in Unfold on iOS and Android.
nodes.title: Bio Sites by Unfold - Share your links. Connect with your audience.
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 通过Unfold的Bio网站以一个链接分享您的网站、产品、社交页面等。你有多个链接，你的简历也应该有。可在iOS和Android的Unfold中使用。
localize.tagline: 分享您的链接。与您的观众联系。

localize.description: 通過Unfold的Bio網站以一個鏈接分享您的網站、產品、社交頁面等。你有多個鏈接，你的簡歷也應該有。可在iOS和Android的Unfold中使用。
localize.tagline: 分享您的鏈接。與您的觀衆聯繫。

nodes.excerpt: 💰 Did you make bank on $GME, $AMC or anything Elon mentioned? Did you cash in at your startup's IPO? 👉 Think you can invest in this fund? You probably aren't rich enough. 🤑 This could be the fund for you.
nodes.title: Fuck You Money Capital - The only fund you get to spend your stonks money
nodes.author: Toby Allen

localize.description: 💰你在$GME，$AMC或者Elon提到的任何东西上赚到钱了吗？你在你的创业公司IPO时兑现了吗？👉觉得你可以投资这个基金吗？你可能还不够有钱。🤑 这可能是适合你的基金。
localize.tagline: 唯一的基金，你可以花你的石头钱。

localize.description: 💰你在$GME，$AMC或者Elon提到的任何東西上賺到錢了嗎？你在你的創業公司IPO時兌現了嗎？👉覺得你可以投資這個基金嗎？你可能還不夠有錢。🤑 這可能是適合你的基金。
localize.tagline: 唯一的基金，你可以花你的石頭錢。

nodes.excerpt: ISP Logger is an automated internet speed performance analytics tool. A small open source script performs a speed test on a docker image every hour and can be analysed on the easy to use Dashboard.
nodes.title: ISP Logger - Automated internet performance monitoring
nodes.author: Ronald Langeveld

localize.description: ISP Logger是一款自动化的网速性能分析工具。一个小型的开源脚本每隔一小时对docker镜像进行一次速度测试，并可以在易于使用的Dashboard上进行分析。
localize.tagline: 互联网性能自动监测

localize.description: ISP Logger是一款自動化的網速性能分析工具。一個小型的開源腳本每隔一小時對docker鏡像進行一次速度測試，並可以在易於使用的Dashboard上進行分析。
localize.tagline: 互聯網性能自動監測

nodes.excerpt: React Bundle by Flatlogic is a collection of various templates. You can see three admin templates with classic design, one with material one, a mobile starter template, a user management template, and an accounting template.
nodes.title: React Bundle - All premium React themes and templates
nodes.author: Nastassia Ovchinnikova

localize.description: Flatlogic的React Bundle是一个各种模板的集合。你可以看到三个经典设计的管理模板，一个是素材模板，一个是移动启动模板，一个是用户管理模板，一个是会计模板。
localize.tagline: 所有高级React主题和模板

localize.description: Flatlogic的React Bundle是一個各種模板的集合。你可以看到三個經典設計的管理模板，一個是素材模板，一個是移動啓動模板，一個是用戶管理模板，一個是會計模板。
localize.tagline: 所有高級React主題和模板

nodes.excerpt: Toad is the simplest URL shortener with a built-in API, detailed analytics, and custom domain support. Toad is built to be fun yet powerful. What's stopping you? Make the leap!
nodes.title: Toad - The simplest URL shortener
nodes.author: Zach Waterfield

localize.description: Toad是最简单的URL缩短器，具有内置的API，详细的分析和自定义域名支持。Toad的设计既有趣又强大。是什么阻止了你？跃跃欲试吧
localize.tagline: 最简单的URL缩短器

localize.description: Toad是最簡單的URL縮短器，具有內置的API，詳細的分析和自定義域名支持。Toad的設計既有趣又強大。是什麼阻止了你？躍躍欲試吧
localize.tagline: 最簡單的URL縮短器

nodes.excerpt: Do you support decentralization and an open internet that isn’t dominated by a handful of Big Tech companies? Now you can be part of the revolution by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine.
nodes.title: Presearch - A Better Search Engine - Support decentralized search by becoming a node operator.
nodes.author: Alex Carrabre

localize.description: 你是否支持去中心化和开放的互联网，而不是由少数大科技公司主导？现在，你可以通过运营一个Presearch节点，帮助推动Presearch去中心化搜索引擎，成为革命的一部分。
localize.tagline: 支持去中心化搜索，成为节点运营商。

localize.description: 你是否支持去中心化和開放的互聯網，而不是由少數大科技公司主導？現在，你可以通過運營一個Presearch節點，幫助推動Presearch去中心化搜索引擎，成爲革命的一部分。
localize.tagline: 支持去中心化搜索，成爲節點運營商。

nodes.excerpt: This extension attempts to recover your suspended Great Suspender tabs by searching your browser history and displaying any found suspended tabs. You can then: - adjust grouping, sorting and detail - save as folders and bookmarks - copy URLs to the clipboard
nodes.title: The Great Suspender Recovery Tool - Recover your lost Great Suspender tabs
nodes.author: Dave Stewart

localize.description: 该扩展程序通过搜索您的浏览器历史记录并显示任何发现的暂停标签，试图恢复您暂停的Great Suspender标签。然后您可以 - 调整分组、排序和细节 - 保存为文件夹和书签 - 将URL复制到剪贴板上
localize.tagline: 恢复您丢失的Great Suspender tabs

localize.description: 該擴展程序通過搜索您的瀏覽器歷史記錄並顯示任何發現的暫停標籤，試圖恢復您暫停的Great Suspender標籤。然後您可以 - 調整分組、排序和細節 - 保存爲文件夾和書籤 - 將URL複製到剪貼板上
localize.tagline: 恢復您丟失的Great Suspender tabs

nodes.excerpt: Generate the best and funny memes right from your device using Meme Dealer. The meme creation process is so simple and sleek; you will have fun using it every time.

nodes.excerpt: Startup goes MRRR - Parody on 'Printing Machine goes BRRR'. This is for all solo entrepreneurs, startup founders and indie hackers out there seeking that sweet MRR, that need a good laugh on this Friday.

localize.description: 创业者去MRRR--模仿 "打印机去BRRR"。这是为所有的个人创业者，创业创始人和独立黑客有寻求甜蜜的MRRR，需要一个很好的笑在这个星期五。

nodes.excerpt: Pod Stack is an easy-to-use Notion template that helps you create & manage your podcast. You'll find hundreds of prebuilt components, tools, and resources. From episode preparation to monetization, we have you covered. Get $5 off with "producthunt"!
nodes.title: Pod Stack - Create & manage your podcast with this Notion template.
nodes.author: Tem Nugmanov

localize.description: Pod Stack是一个易于使用的Notion模板，可以帮助你创建和管理你的播客。你会发现数以百计的预制组件、工具和资源。从剧集准备到货币化，我们为您提供服务。使用 "producthunt "可获得5美元优惠!
localize.tagline: 用这个Notion模板创建和管理你的播客。

localize.description: Pod Stack是一個易於使用的Notion模板，可以幫助你創建和管理你的播客。你會發現數以百計的預製組件、工具和資源。從劇集準備到貨幣化，我們爲您提供服務。使用 "producthunt "可獲得5美元優惠!
localize.tagline: 用這個Notion模板創建和管理你的播客。

nodes.excerpt: Sender is an affordable (4x cheaper than MailChimp!) and super easy to use email marketing platform with all essential email marketing features, solid deliverability, and top-notch support.
nodes.title: Sender - Super easy and affordable email marketing platform

nodes.excerpt: You probably have a few social media accounts... We built Luma to be your home online, between the big networks. Share your Luma to connect with your audience, showcase your content, and make money.

nodes.excerpt: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
nodes.title: ICONFi - Keep your savings simple with ICONFi.
nodes.author: Molly Waldron

localize.description: ICONFi是一个数字资产储蓄平台。ICONFi可以让你赚取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在内的数字资产的利息，并提供一个简单的ICX押注解决方案。ICONFi以简单、安全的用户界面帮助你增加投资。
localize.tagline: ICONFi让你的储蓄变得简单。

localize.description: ICONFi是一個數字資產儲蓄平臺。ICONFi可以讓你賺取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在內的數字資產的利息，並提供一個簡單的ICX押注解決方案。ICONFi以簡單、安全的用戶界面幫助你增加投資。
localize.tagline: ICONFi讓你的儲蓄變得簡單。

nodes.excerpt: No more messy bookmarks. No more missing out. Dev Resources has everything a developer needs, presented in curated lists. Improve your skill set, find assets, discover your next favourite tool and get great discounts on digital products — all in one place.
nodes.title: Dev Resources - Collaborative list of resources for developers
nodes.author: Marcel Cruz

localize.description: 不再有凌乱的书签。不再错过。开发资源拥有开发者所需的一切，并以精选列表的形式呈现。提高您的技能，寻找资产，发现您下一个最喜欢的工具，并获得数字产品的巨大折扣 - 所有这些都在一个地方。
localize.tagline: 开发者资源协作清单

localize.description: 不再有凌亂的書籤。不再錯過。開發資源擁有開發者所需的一切，並以精選列表的形式呈現。提高您的技能，尋找資產，發現您下一個最喜歡的工具，並獲得數字產品的巨大折扣 - 所有這些都在一個地方。
localize.tagline: 開發者資源協作清單

nodes.excerpt: Sell any digital product in under a minute and keep 99% of what you make after payment processing fees. No monthly fees either.

nodes.excerpt: Get a video call and scheduler feature into your services in the blink of an eye. Wondercall 2.0 is the more powerful embedded video call system for any website & app. Now you can not only make calls but also schedule them. And the way to check all engagement!
nodes.title: Wondercall 2.0 - Add video call and scheduler into any service in seconds
nodes.author: Howie Young

localize.description: 在一眨眼的功夫，就能将视频通话和调度功能融入到您的服务中。Wondercall 2.0是更强大的嵌入式视频通话系统的任何网站和应用程序。现在，您不仅可以拨打电话，还可以安排他们。和方式来检查所有参与

localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將視頻呼叫和調度程序添加到任何服務中。

nodes.excerpt: Switch off. Slow down. Sundayy is the mindfulness based social network designed to be checked just once a week. Sundayy represents spending time away from feeds, thinking deeper about our days, and sharing what matters with the people who matter.
nodes.title: Sundayy - The social network you check once a week, on Sunday.
nodes.author: Jillian Schuller

localize.description: 关掉。慢下来。Sundayy是基于心灵的社交网络，设计为每周只需检查一次。Sundayy代表着花时间远离feeds，深入思考我们的日子，并与重要的人分享重要的事情。
localize.tagline: 你每周都要检查一次的社交网络，在周日。

localize.description: 關掉。慢下來。Sundayy是基於心靈的社交網絡，設計爲每週只需檢查一次。Sundayy代表着花時間遠離feeds，深入思考我們的日子，並與重要的人分享重要的事情。
localize.tagline: 你每週都要檢查一次的社交網絡，在週日。

nodes.excerpt: A growing list of various types of emails (promotional, newsletter, onboarding, etc.) from the best brands, breaking down and highlighting everything you need to know about each email. Learn how the top brands create their emails!
nodes.title: Email Spotlights - The best brand emails, annotated.
nodes.author: Alec Beglarian

localize.description: 来自最佳品牌的各种类型的电子邮件（促销、通讯、入职等）的不断增长的列表，分解并突出你需要知道的关于每封电子邮件的一切。了解顶级品牌如何创建他们的电子邮件!
localize.tagline: 最好的品牌邮件，批注。

localize.description: 來自最佳品牌的各種類型的電子郵件（促銷、通訊、入職等）的不斷增長的列表，分解並突出你需要知道的關於每封電子郵件的一切。瞭解頂級品牌如何創建他們的電子郵件!
localize.tagline: 最好的品牌郵件，批註。
